ygData.subject: Re: Skills for wizard
ygData.msgSnippet: U can t hotkey Mediation. U can only access it in ur spellbook anyway. One thing about melee skill ofr wiz, forget it. U can t do much with it at later level,
ygData.messageBody:
U can't hotkey Mediation. U can only access it in ur spellbook anyway.
One thing about melee skill ofr wiz, forget it. U can't do much with it at
later level, though it's better than nothing. heheh. There is no total skill
cpa like in UO but there is a maximum skill u can get at a lvl depending on
the skill and the class/race of ur character. eg, a lvl 1 druid can heal
much better than my lvl 9 paladin.

The trade skills are not meant for beginner players. U gotta to have
lots of cash to play around with, though tailoring is good for beginning
players (as like in UO, go figures. heheh).
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 09:14
Subject: [sg-everquest] Skills for wizard


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Yo,
>
> Since no one has made an wizard amg our kakis, I've decided to make one 2
> days ago. Now my wiz is lvl 3. So far I've spend my practice points on
2H
> blunt, chanelling, adjure, evoke and alter. I still have 10 points with
> me.
>
> Any suggestion what other skills to train?
>
> I'm not sure how the skills thingy work, if there is a total skill cap for
> your char. I wish to learn some $$$ skills which do not required much
$$$
> (eg on buying material, initial investment and l/t investment), any
> suggestion?
>
> So far I didnt spend any practice points in melee skills. I started off
> with a dagger and when I earn enuff $$$ to buy worn great stave, I keep on
> using it. The skills rise when I hunt with the staves. I would also like
> to seek advice if it's worth to train unarmed melee skills for wiz (like
in
> monk). If there is a total skill cap, I will try to specialize in 1 or 2
> melee skills. If not skill cap, I dun mind training unarmed combat skill
> since after the newbie period, I wouldn't resurrect with a dagger, right?
>
> Any recommendation what spells are good for wiz? Also, is there any way
to
> make medation a hotkey? (sorry for those who reply me on my previous
> mediation query, I need to ask again coz I dunno what u mean)
>
> Btw, my wiz is a high-elf, name is Ziltus, after his long-lost brother
> Zilred (enchanter) ;)
>
>
>
>
